member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UnlockSupportActivity
member.summary: The UnlockSupportActivity class unlocks support for optional LEADTOOLS features, such as LEADTOOLS Document/Medical capabilities.
member.remarks: For more information, refer to Unlocking Special LEAD Features.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UnlockSupportActivity.Execute(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext)
member.param: The execution environment of the activity.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UnlockSupportActivity.System#Runtime#Serialization#ISerializable#GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Populates a specified with the data needed to serialize this object.
member.param: The contextual information about the source or destination of the serialization.

remarks.para: The class supports standard .NET serialization. Serialization a is the process of converting the state of an object into a form that can be persisted or transported. The complement of serialization is deserialization, which converts a stream into an object. Together, these processes allow the image data to be easily stored and transferred.

When you serialize an object, all the data inside the object are saved. This include the image data of all pages as well as the current page number, region information, low bit/high bit, palette data, metadata (tags, markers and comments), etc. In other words, the can be constructed back to its original state from the stream.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UnlockSupportActivity.DeveloperKey
member.summary: Sets the developer key for a runtime license for LEADTOOLS and unlock functionality.
member.value: String containing the developer key for the runtime license.

remarks.para: For more information, refer to Unlocking Special LEAD Features.
For information about LEADTOOLS Document/Medical capabilities, contact LEAD.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UnlockSupportActivity.LicenseFilePath
member.summary: Sets the filename for the runtime license file for LEADTOOLS.
member.value: String containing the filename of the runtime license file.

remarks.para: For more information, refer to Unlocking Special LEAD Features.
For information about LEADTOOLS Document/Medical capabilities, contact LEAD.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImageActivity
member.summary: The WorkflowImageActivity class is the base class for all the LEADTOOLS WF activities that contain an image but do not automatically dispose it.
member.remarks: This activity does not do anything; it just contains properties that are common to some of the other LEADTOOLS activities.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImageActivity.ImageProperty
member.summary: Identifies the and the dependency properties.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImageActivity.ImageCopy
member.summary: Gets a copy of the activity's image object.
member.value: A reference to a copy of the activity's image.
member.remarks: This property is used in situations where a copy of the activity's image is needed, such as when using parallel activities where copies of an activity's image are passed to a subsequent parallel activity. If a reference to the image is needed, use the property.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImageActivity.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets a reference to the activity's image.
member.value: A reference to the activity's image.
member.remarks: This property is used in situations where a reference to the activity's image is needed. Using this property to bind activities will cause the workflow to process the same copy of the image. If a copy of the image is needed, use the property.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UpdateCodecsOptionsEventArgs
member.summary: Provides a property for the LoadImageActivity.GetCredentials, SaveImageActivity.GetCredentials, and GetImageInfoActivity.GetCredentials events to set the appropriate RasterCodecs options used for file loading and saving.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UpdateCodecsOptionsEventArgs.#ctor(Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs)
member.param: The RasterCodecs instance used by the activity.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.UpdateCodecsOptionsEventArgs.RasterCodecsInstance
member.summary: Gets the RasterCodecs object used for file access. You can change the properties of this object for more control over the load and save options.
member.value: The RasterCodecs object used for file access. You can change the properties of this object for more control over the load and save options.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.TiffImageInfo
member.summary: Provides information specific to TIFF images.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.TiffImageInfo.HasNoPalette
member.summary: Determines if the image has no palette.
member.value: true if the image is saved without a palette, false if the image is saved with a palette.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.TiffImageInfo.ImageFileDirectoryOffset
member.summary: Gets the image file directory offset.
member.value: The image file directory offset.
member.remarks: Use this to speed up the handling of TIFF files with many pages.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.TiffImageInfo.IsImageFileDirectoryOffsetValid
member.summary: Determines whether or not the image has a valid image file directory (IFD).
member.value: true if the image has a valid IFD, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.DisposableImageActivity
member.summary: The WorkflowImageActivity class is the base class for all the LEADTOOLS WF activities that contain an image and can automatically dispose of it.
member.remarks: This activity does not do anything; it just contains properties that are common to some of the other LEADTOOLS activities.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.DisposableImageActivity.DisposeImage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether the activity should free its image after being executed.
member.value: true means that the activity should free its image after being executed; false means that it should keep the image.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.GetCredentialsEventArgs
member.summary: Provides a property for the LoadImageActivity.GetCredentials, SaveImageActivity.GetCredentials, and GetImageInfoActivity.GetCredentials events to set the appropriate ICredentials object for file access.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.GetCredentialsEventArgs.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the ICredentials object to use for file access. This member has to be set to a new instance of an ICredentials object.
member.value: The ICredentials object being to use for file access.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImage
member.summary: The RasterImage class serves as a means for passing image data between the different LEADTOOLS WF activities.
member.remarks: Every LEADTOOLS activity that operates on, or returns an image will have a RasterImage property that is set to the image to be operated on, or will contain the resulting image of that activity.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImage.#ctor
member.remarks: The resulting RasterImage will not have any image data in it. You will need to set the property to a reference to a valid object.

members.member:
Constructs a new RasterImage from the specified existing object.
yes 2/28/2009
The from which to create the new RasterImage.
This constructor will not make a copy of ; it will reference it. Therefore, should not be disposed after calling this constructor.
///

Releases all resources used by this RasterImage.
yes 2/28/2009
For more information, refer to .
///

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImage.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per pixel of this .
member.value: The bits per pixel of this .
member.remarks: The object supports image data of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48 and 64 bits per pixel A 16-bpp image may be color or grayscale. If you are working with a 16-bit grayscale image, then use RasterByteOrder.Gray when creating the image. By default, the Order for a 16-bit image will be set to RasterByteOrder.Bgr

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImage.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of this in pixels.
member.value: The height of this in pixels.
member.remarks: This is the actual number of scanlines of image data.

member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in the this .
member.value: The total number of pages in the this .

member.summary: Gets the width of this in pixels.
member.value: The width of this in pixels.
member.remarks: This is the actual width of the image data scanline.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image horizontal resolution, in dots per inch (DPI).

member.remarks: Some file formats save this value in the file header.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.WorkflowImage.OriginalFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the original image format of this WorkflowImage.
member.value: The original image format of this WorkflowImage.

remarks.para: When a object is created by loading it from an image file, this property will hold the format type of the file as a enumeration member.
If the was created by other means (for example, through the constructor or scanning), the value of this property will be RasterImageFormat.Unknown.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity
member.summary: The SaveImageActivity class saves an image in any of the supported formats.
member.remarks: The image to be saved should be assigned to the property.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.Execute(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext)
member.param: The execution environment of the activity.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.GetCredentials
member.summary: Gets called just before the file is saved to enable the client to set the appropriate network credentials.
member.remarks: The callback receives an object that contains the ICredentials object to set.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.UpdateCodecsOptions
member.summary: Gets called just before the saved file is loaded to enable the client to set the appropriate saving options.
member.remarks: The callback receives an object that contains the RasterCodecs object used for file access.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.SaveMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines how to handle the page when saving to multipage formats.
member.value: A value that determines how to handle the page when saving to multipage formats.
member.remarks:
Values for this property can be one of the following:
ValueMeaning
CodecsSavePageMode.AppendAppend the new page(s) to the end of the file. If the file does not exist, this option will create the file and add the pages to it. is not used.
CodecsSavePageMode.InsertInsert the new page(s) at the index specified by .
CodecsSavePageMode.ReplaceReplace the page(s) starting at the index specified by .
CodecsSavePageMode.OverwriteOverwrite the page(s) starting at the index specified by .
CodecsSavePageMode.AppendAppend the new page(s) to the end of the file. If the file does not exist, this option will create the file and add the pages to it.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the resulting file's pixel depth.
member.value: The resulting file's pixel depth.
member.remarks: If this property is 0 , the image will be stored using the closest bits/pixel value supported by that format. For example, if a file format supports 1, 4, and 24 bits/pixel, and is 5, the file will be stored as 24 bit. Likewise, if is 2, the file will be stored as 4 bit.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.FirstPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the 1-based index of the first page in the image to save.
member.value: The 1-based index of the first page in the image to save.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.FirstSavePageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the 1-based index of the first output page. If the output file already exists, then this parameter lets you control which pages to overwrite and/or where to append the new pages.
member.value: The 1-based index of the first output page. If the output file already exists, then this parameter lets you control which pages to overwrite and/or where to append the new pages.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.LastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the 1-based index of the last page in the image to save. Pass -1 to save from to the last page in image.
member.value: The 1-based index of the last page in the image to save.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.SaveImageActivity.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the output file format.
member.value: The output file format.
member.remarks:
For valid values, refer to
Summary of All Supported Image File Formats.

member.value: The name of the image file to be saved.

member.summary: ROMM order. ROMM only supports 24 and 48-bit images.

member.summary: Load the image as red, green, blue OR as a 12 or 16-bit grayscale image OR as ROMM. ROMM only supports 24 and 48-bit color images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.CodecsSavePageMode
member.summary: Indicates the operation to perform when saving multipage files.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.CodecsSavePageMode.Append
member.summary: Append the page to the end of the file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.CodecsSavePageMode.Insert
member.summary: Insert the page at the specified index.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.CodecsSavePageMode.Replace
member.summary: Replace the page at the specified index.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.RasterSizeFlags
member.summary: Flags which control the behavior of image resize methods

summary.para: (Document/Medical only) Preserve black objects when making the image smaller. This option affects only 1-bit, black-and-white images, where it prevents the disappearance of thin lines. You can use a bitwise OR ( | ) to combine this flag with another one. For example, Resample | FavorBlack causes color images to be resampled, but applies the favor-black option to 1-bit, black-and-white images.
If you apply this flag to an image that has more than 1 bit per pixel, then the behavior is undefined.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.RasterSizeFlags.Resample
member.summary: Use linear interpolation and averaging to produce a higher-quality image

member.name: F:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.RasterSizeFlags.Bicubic
member.summary: Use bicubic interpolation and averaging to produce a higher quality image. This is slower than Resample

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity
member.summary: The LoadActivity class loads image files in any supported format.
member.remarks: The loaded image is returned in the property.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.Execute(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext)
member.param: The execution environment of the activity.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.GetCredentials
member.summary: Gets called just before the file is loaded to enable the client to set the appropriate network credentials.
member.remarks: The callback receives an object that contains the ICredentials object to set.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.UpdateCodecsOptions
member.summary: Gets called just before the file is loaded to enable the client to set the appropriate loading options.
member.remarks: The callback receives an object that contains the RasterCodecs object used for file access.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.ByteOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the color order for 16-, 24-, 32-, 48-, and 64-bit images. If the resulting image is less than 16 bits per pixel, this will have no effect since palletized images have no order.
member.value: The color order for 16-, 24-, 32-, 48-, and 64-bit images.
member.remarks:
Valid values for this property are:
ValueMeaning
CodecsLoadByteOrder.RgbRed, green, and blue color order in memory
CodecsLoadByteOrder.BgrBlue, green, and red color order in memory
CodecsLoadByteOrder.Gray12 or 16-bit grayscale image. 12 and 16-bit grayscale images are only supported in the Document/Medical Imaging editions.
CodecsLoadByteOrder.RgbOrGrayLoad the image as red, green, blue OR as a 12 or 16-bit grayscale image. 12 and 16-bit grayscale images are supported in the Document/Medical Imaging editions
CodecsLoadByteOrder.BgrOrGrayLoad the image as blue, green, red OR as a 12 or 16-bit grayscale image. 12 and 16-bit grayscale images are supported in the Document/Medical Imaging editions
CodecsLoadByteOrder.RommROMM order. ROMM only supports 24 and 48-bit images
CodecsLoadByteOrder.BgrOrGrayOrRommLoad the image as red, green, blue OR as a 12 or 16-bit grayscale image OR as ROMM. 12 and 16-bit grayscale images are supported in the Document/Medical Imaging editions only. ROMM only supports 24 and 48-bit color images.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the resulting image pixel depth.
member.value: The resulting image pixel depth.
member.remarks: Valid values for this property are: 0, 1 to 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.FirstPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the 1-based index of the first page to load.
member.value: The 1-based index of the first page to load.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.LastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the 1-based index of the last page to load.
member.value: The 1-based index of the last page to load.
member.remarks: The value for this property must be greater than or equal to . You can pass -1 to load from to the last page in the file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.LoadImageActivity.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the name of the image file to load.
member.value: The name of the image file to load.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.PsdImageInfo
member.summary: Provides information specific to PSD images.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Workflow.Raster.PsdImageInfo.Layers
member.summary: Gets the number of layers in the PSD file.
member.value: An integer value that represents the number of layers in the PSD file.

remarks.para: If this value is 0, then the PSD file does not contain any layers.
For more information on PSD layers, refer to the FILE FORMATS SPECIFICATION from Adobe.
